description: Creates a custom domain association for Amazon Redshift Serverless.

parameters.name: customDomainCertificateArn
parameters.description: The custom domain name's certificate Amazon resource name (ARN).

parameters.name: customDomainName
parameters.description: The custom domain name to associate with the workgroup.

parameters.name: workgroupName
parameters.description: The name of the workgroup associated with the database.
